holidays.title: National Paranormal Day
holidays.description: Grab your Ouija board and let's start communicating with the great beyond.

holidays.title: AAPI Women's Equal Pay Day
holidays.description: Observe A.A.P.I. Women's Equal Pay Day to remember that women are paid less.

holidays.title: Constitution Memorial Day
holidays.description: Today Japan upholds banners of peace and democracy by renouncing violence and war for humanity’s betterment.

holidays.title: Cross Day (El Salvador)
holidays.description: Let’s join hands with the rest of El Salvador to celebrate this special day.

holidays.title: Great American Grump Out
holidays.description: Hey Great America! Let’s give our grumpy mood a day off today.

holidays.title: International Wild Koala Day
holidays.description: Let’s do our part to save koalas this International Wild Koala Day!

holidays.title: National Anxiety Disorders Screening Day
holidays.description: Learn more about this day that draws attention to anxiety disorders and mental wellness.

holidays.title: National Chocolate Custard Day
holidays.description: Some call it pudding, some call it custard, but let’s celebrate it regardless of its name!

holidays.title: National Garden Meditation Day
holidays.description: Relax your mind and body as we tell you about the marvelous benefits of garden meditation.

holidays.title: National Interpreter Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Can you imagine a world with no interpreters? We can’t! Celebrate National Interpreter Appreciation Day today!

holidays.title: National Justice Day
holidays.description: Don't get it twisted — not all Justices are judges. Celebrate National Justice Day with us!

holidays.title: National Lumpy Rug Day
holidays.description: It’s time to let go of the old, and usher in the new this spring.

holidays.title: National Montana Day
holidays.description: With our amazing tips and facts, you can celebrate Montana, the Land of Treasures!

holidays.title: National Public Radio Day
holidays.description: Let’s educate people so that they understand and appreciate the value of public radio stations.

holidays.title: National Raspberry Pop Over Day
holidays.description: Sit back and pop some raspberries as you read; it's sure to be a sweet ride.

holidays.title: National SAN Architect Day
holidays.description: SAN architects work behind the scenes to put their companies front and center.

holidays.title: National Skilled Trades Day
holidays.description: Join millions across the country as we celebrate the tireless efforts of the skilled trades workforce.

holidays.title: National Specially-Able Pets Day
holidays.description: Your annual reminder that disabled pets are perfectly capable of loving and enjoying life.

holidays.title: National Textile Day
holidays.description: Whether with plain or bold textiles, get ready to make a statement this holiday!

holidays.title: National Textiles Day
holidays.description: They clothe us, give us a peaceful sleep, and create things to sit on. They’re textiles!

holidays.title: National Two Different Colored Shoes Day
holidays.description: Embrace all your quirks and celebrate all the characteristics that make you uniquely you!

holidays.title: Project Aces Day
holidays.description: Put on your workout shoes and stretchy pants, it's time to exercise.

holidays.title: Sun Day
holidays.description: Let’s advocate for the use of solar power which is 100% inexhaustible energy, and renewable and free!

holidays.title: Wordsmith Day
holidays.description: Wordsmith Day is a time to celebrate, recognize and honor talented writers!

holidays.title: World Press Freedom Day
holidays.description: Reaffirm your commitment to the truth and join millions in defending freedom of the press.

holidays.title: Damon Dash’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dash for Cash, the boss of hip-hop and among the most successful moguls of all time.

holidays.title: Dawn Farmer’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this Tiktok star, lifting the spirits of millions by reviewing American snacks is her goal.

holidays.title: James Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mr. Dynamite, the Godfather of Soul, and the father of funk lived up to his name.

holidays.title: Karen Huger’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality star and entrepreneur has always been known as a high flier.
